name: namstereact
description: - Dev Build - Local Server - HMR = Hot module replacement - File Watching Algorithm - written by c++ - Faster Build bcoz of Caching - Image Optimization - Minification of file (bundling) - Compressing - Consistent Hashing  - Code splitting - Differential bundling - to support older browsers - Diagnostics - Error handling - https - Tree Shaking - remove unused code - Differect dev and prod bundles
